meanings.sent1: Her antitraditional views on marriage surprised her family.
meanings.sent2: The artist's antitraditional style challenged the norms of the art world.
meanings.sent3: It was quite antitraditional for him to wear sneakers to a formal event.
meanings.sent4: Her antitraditional approach to cooking turned the kitchen into a creative playground.
meanings.sent5: The antitraditional decorations at the party made it unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Not conforming to or following traditional practices or beliefs.
meanings.sent1: The antitraditional ceremony was a breath of fresh air for the community.
meanings.sent2: His antitraditional methods of teaching sparked curiosity in his students.
meanings.sent3: The antitraditional recipe for the cake included unexpected ingredients.
meanings.sent4: Her antitraditional fashion sense always stood out in a crowd.
meanings.sent5: The antitraditional decision to travel by bike amazed everyone.
